footer.goal: iNsailing is a platform that unites captains, skippers, yacht owners with athletes, participants in regattas, fellow travelers and students. The platform will facilitate the search for places on the regatta, introduce the skipper.
footer.descriptionForRights: iNsailing.com - regattas, cruises, yacht schools and courses around the world.

optimization.title: iNsailing — sailing events in the world!
optimization.description: Choose sailing events and be part of it! Regattas, cruises, training, schools, courses, etc.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.description: Usually, organizers provide a place on a yacht or a private cabin of your choice. You can stay at the hotel as well. You can see photos of yachts interiors on the pages of offers from organizers.

header.headerDescription: With us you can easily book your seats on regattas, cruises or organize your own event. If necessary, get training or receive informational assistance.

headerDescriptionCategory.races: Take part in sailing regattas around the world — from the Mediterranean to the Atlantic. Learn the basics of seamanship and meet like-minded people. Once you go to your first regatta, you will forever fall in love with the sails.
headerDescriptionCategory.cruise: Embark on a sailing cruise with your family, friends or colleagues. With us you can book a cruise in any direction. When going on a sailing cruise you will experience bright emotions experience together with the people you love!
headerDescriptionCategory.deliveryMileBuilding: Mile building during long sea passages gives you the opportunity to try yourself in a role of a skipper in different conditions. A professional experienced skipper will always be next to you, give advice and guidance, and teach you the intricacies of sailing.
headerDescriptionCategory.rentWithCaptain: Yacht charter with a captain is a great opportunity for those who want to relax and try yachting. You do not need to think about the logistics of such a trip. Thanks to the professional captain, your stay on the yacht will be as comfortable as possible.
headerDescriptionCategory.sailingTraining: Nowadays, there is a wide variety of training schools and programs that will help you obtain an international license, such as RYA / IVT / ISSA. With us you can find and select the right school or courses worldwide and communicate directly with the organizers.

step7.title: Additional information
step7.specify: Can I not specify the conditions?
step7.specifyPopup: There may be a lot of text here.
step7.indicate: Specify the maximum number of available seats:
step7.members: Recommended conditions for participation that are the most frequently requested by users:
step7.description3: Yacht with skipper for your team
step7.descriptionValue: Please indicate the possible additional costs, for example: mooring at marinas, food, fuel, registration fees for the regatta per person, etc.
step7.add: Add another option for this boat
step7.recommend: We recommend to indicate the price for participation without additional costs, but taking into account the organizational fee (if there is one at the event).
step7.remember: Dear Organizer, please remember that the iNsailing company applies Service Fees. This Service Fee equals 10% from the total cost of participation and calculates based on the booking subtotal. The Service fee will be deducted automatically before transferring the amount from the Participant to the Organizer. More information about Terms of Payments you can find in the iNsailing Terms and Conditions

step8.title: Confirmation
step8.response: If there is no response to a potential participant within 24 hours, we will try to contact you by phone. If we can not reach you, we leave the right to offer another options to the participant and to deactivate your information.
step8.profile: Your organizer profile is almost complete.

prof.title: Mandatory information
prof.name: Name
prof.nameonly: Your public profile displays only your name.
prof.data: We use this data only for analysis and never share it with anyone.
prof.personal: We will not disclose your personal email address to other participants iNsailing
prof.contact: Phone number for guests to contact, requests for reservations, reminders and other notifications. This is necessary so that the other organizers, guests and participants of iNsailing can contact you.
prof.send: We will send you messages in this language.
prof.descr: iNsailing is based on relationships. Help others get to know you. Tell about your interests: what is your experience in sailing? Which sailing events have you already participated? How often do you used to sail? Tell us, what kind of skipper or guest are you: how do you like to sail? Tell them about yourself: what are your life principles?
prof.changed: Your profile data has been successfully changed.
prof.verification: You have successfully verified your account

supportModal.information: We are always ready to answer questions, assist with choosing the event, give detailed advice, or connect with the captain or organizer of the event.

safety.title: Safety at the sea
safety.description: Be careful when working with loaded ropes. Never step or sit on ropes. Always wear gloves. When working with a winch, your fingers should never be between the drum and the ropes. Be careful not to get the ends of your clothes or long hair in the winch. Take care of your head: beware of the geek and the spinnaker geek.

communication.title: Communication rules
communication.description: Communicate only through iNsailing platform. For security reasons, do not transfer money or communicate outside the iNsailing website.

clothes.title: What clothes do I need?

involved.title: How to get involved?
involved.description:
You can leave a request for participation in the selected sailing event at any time. You do not need to register for this. Just select the event you like and the suitable ticket (offer), and reserve a place.

Nevertheless, we recommend to register on our website in order to receive the necessary notifications about your bookings.

toBookPlace.title: How to book a place in the event?
toBookPlace.description:
To reserve a place at any sailing event, you need to select an offer from our offers list for the selected event and send a request for participation. To send a participation request, you must provide your contact information.

After authorization, within 24 hours, the organizer must answer you: accept the request for a reservation or reject it.

After the organizer has accepted your request for participation, the appropriate amount for participation in the event will be debited from your card.

Before sending a reservation request, you can also contact the organizer and clarify all your questions — this is entirely free. After receiving answers from the organizer — you can send a request for a reservation.

toContactOrganizer.title: How to contact the organizer?
toContactOrganizer.description: Before booking, you can contact the organizer through the iNsailing platform, sending him a request for correspondence and find out, ask all your questions. After booking confirmation, iNsailing will provide you with all the contact information of the organizer or owner of the yacht.

cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation policy
cancellationPolicy.description:
If you want to cancel your reservation within 24 hours after payment, you will receive a full refund.

Cancellation fees:
— cancellation for the reservation more than 60 days before the event — a full refund,
— cancellation for the reservation less than 60 days before the event — 10% of the reservation amount,
— cancellation for the reservation less than 30 days before the event — 25% of the reservation amount,
— cancellation for the reservation 15 days or less before the event — 50% of the reservation amount,
— cancellation for the reservation less than 48 hours before the start of the event — Cancellation fee — 100% (considered individually).

The Cancellation Fee will be applied to the organizer's or participant's account if applicable.
